title: RSSB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 1535 Ayush Medical Officer Posts
description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 1535 Ayush Medical Office Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the BAMS, BHMS, and BUMS can grab this chance and apply for the RSSB Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirants can apply online through the website on or be...
